ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] lil help
ygData.msgSnippet: look at eqdb.allakhazam.com it has Item Lists and Item Searches.You can find necro items and their price range. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
look at eqdb.allakhazam.com it has Item Lists and Item Searches.You can find
necro items and their price range.
luv,
-Su

> ok you guys i need some help. I started a Dark Elf Shadow Knight
> yesterday. Everyone says i picked a bad combination and they are
> extremely hard to play with, but thats why i picked it. Anyways I
> need me some armor and a good weapon. Can one of you ppl that know
> alot about the game, suggest me a good weapon and a good fix on armor
> within the range of 100pp for the weapon and 100pp for the armor? I'd
> really appreciate it. Right now I have Kodiak claws that hit for 9
> dmg. They are pretty quick too, and only weight 1.0. So please if you
> are gonna suggest a weapon plz suggest one better than that. My body
> armor is 15ac too, so don't really have to suggest body armor....
> Well, thank ya lots, peace.
>
> Ohh by the way, I forgot to mention in my last post, I play on
> Bristlebane.... Jaspher...
>
> ~~~Jas~~~
